thread.title: d&d

comments.text: due to an outage tonights d&d will be delayed. there might be however a new game running on fridays nights uk if anyone is interested. i will continue with thursdays
what type of outage is that? thanks
minor outage where anyland went offline 10 mins
gotcha thanks! do you know if all went down (like the "missing header" screen) or it was the type where you can build but not chat & with a red "outage" button?

thread.latestCommentText: gotcha thanks! do you know if all went down (like the "missing header" screen) or it was the type where you can build but with a red "outage" button?
